summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the 'Share Your Score' feature for the Remember the Order memory game. Successfully verified all share functionality including game over modal, share panel, score card generation, and mobile compatibility.

ui_bugs.issue: Copy Link feedback ('Copied!' text and check icon) not consistently visible after clicking

passed_tests: Game over modal shows both Play Again and Share Score buttons
Share button successfully transitions to share panel with score card preview
Share panel contains all 4 action buttons (Share, Post on X, Save Image, Copy Link)
Back to results navigation works correctly
Play Again button functions from results view
Mobile viewport (375px) share panel displays and functions properly
Score card preview image generates correctly on both desktop and mobile
All previously tested game features continue to work (start screen, game modes, tile grid, sequence playback)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Copy Link feedback may need timing adjustment - the 'Copied!' text and check icon don't always appear consistently. This is a very minor UX issue that doesn't affect functionality.
